name: STORM COVERAGE
description:
Play as an umbrella (Get it, "coverage") in a storm. Some maps are ice storms, some fire storms (those are the ones that kill you in red)... Just a few levels but survive until the thermometer (on left) goes high enough... I'm getting a bit burnt out making these, but I'll try to refresh and make some more next week....

For the lo rez jam using PIX64 console; open PIX64 and navigate to STORM COVERAGE)

I'm trying to make more prototypes for game jam to see which ones (if any) you think could be turned into a fun multilevel game leave comments/feedback! Thanks.
